serviceFeature.name: vHike Web Service
serviceFeature.description: Access for vHike services on the web

serviceFeature.name: Exact Location
serviceFeature.description: Provides information about your position for several features of vHike like searching for a ride or a hiker, sharing your location for other members in your trip, making finding each other much easier.

serviceFeature.name: Location Privacy +
serviceFeature.description: This premium feature is only for our premium users. Unless you want to, your exact location will not be available for others so your house will be safe. A random coordinate close to your true position will be used instead to make sure you don't miss a chance of being found and have fun on vHike :-)

serviceFeature.name: Profile Privacy +
serviceFeature.description: Hide your contact information from curious eyes. Who want to share his email address if we got 5 star rating, right? Of course you can always share them with serious users with whom you contact.

serviceFeature.name: Contact +
serviceFeature.description: Direct contact with other user via phone call, SMS and email, right here in vHike.

serviceFeature.name: Notification +
serviceFeature.description: Notify you about new messages on vHike, even when you're using other apps.
